function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High transmission of COVID-19 through contact, droplets, and contaminated surfaces","Impact":"Spread of the virus in confined spaces and built environments","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection, social distancing measures, and improved ventilation systems","Technologies":"Disinfection robots, UV-C sanitation technology, air purification systems","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and individuals in confined environments","Owner":"Health authorities, building managers, and facility owners"},{"Description":"Impact on vulnerable populations, including the elderly and those with specific health conditions","Impact":"Higher risk of severe illness and mortality among vulnerable groups","Mitigation":"Protective measures for high-risk individuals, targeted healthcare support, and public health awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote monitoring devices, and healthcare apps","People":"Elderly individuals, individuals with specific health conditions, and healthcare providers","Owner":"Healthcare providers, government agencies, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Potential economic recession and financial collapse","Impact":"Decreased economic activity, job losses, and strain on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Economic stimulus plans, support for affected industries, and unemployment assistance","Technologies":"Financial modeling and forecasting tools, virtual communication platforms, and remote work technologies","People":"Workers, businesses, and healthcare providers","Owner":"Government agencies, financial institutions, and businesses"}]}
